data.title: FC 24 Futties: Confirmed Team 3 cards and rewards
data.meta_description: Here's what to expect from this year's version of the long-running FC 24 Futties promo in Ultimate Team.
data.text:
EA has certainly been busy with its first non-FIFA football outing, despite the fact that FC 25 is just over the horizon. There are only so many weeks left of us being safe from being relentlessly trolled by professional fouls.

It will all be worth it, though, as there are huge changes coming to FC 25, including in FC 25 Ultimate Team and FC 25 Career Mode.

Pro Clubs is seeing a fairly hefty overhaul, too, with relegations making a comeback.

More like this

Before then, though, there's Futties to be making the most of in FC 24 Ultimate Team. Here's the latest on the promo.

When were the FC 24 Futtie teams released?

FC 24 Futties Team 1 was released in-game on Friday 19th July 2024 and lasted up until 6pm on Friday 26th July.

The Futties Team 2 release date was FC 24 was Friday 26th July 2024 and was available until Friday 2nd August.

Team 3 was released on Friday 2nd August 2024 and will last another week, up until Friday 9th August at 6pm.

FC 24 Futties rewards: Confirmed players

In case you missed it, as part of the Season 8 rewards and Seasonal Objective rewards, you could unlock a selection of Futties cards in FC 24. These included three heroes: Alex Scott, Dirk Kuyt and Saeed Al Owairan.

Futties Seasonal Objectives:

Alex Scott (Hero) | RB | 95 OVR | Assist 7, Score 10, Dynamic 5 and Play 10 while using Futties Fabinho, Mertens and/or Reiten

Kuyt (Hero) | CAM | 96 OVR | Italian Wall 4, Dynamic 8, Score 12 and Play 20 while using Futties Udogie, Diani and/or Aubameyang

Al Owairan (Hero) | RW | 97 OVR | Assist 10, Outside 8, Goal Protection 8 and Play 30 while using Futties Ansu Fati, Rashford and/or Oberdorf

We'll update this page with new Futties players once they have been confirmed.

What is Futties in FC 24? Promo explained

Futties is a promotional event that sees the best Ultimate Team players get re-released with new ratings alongside new icons from the past.

You can upgrade standout players with Futties Evolutions.

Each phase of the event only lasts a week, so you need to pick up the players in the new packs quickly.

Traditionally, Futties gives us the chance to acquire limited edition cards where the players' statistics are dramatically increased. For example, last year’s version saw the likes of Liverpool’s Diogo Jota and Real Madrid’s Vinicius Jr receive a 96 and 98 rated upgrade, respectively.

Anyone who plays the game’s Ultimate Team mode is usually required to vote on a line-up of pre-selected nominees to receive a pink Futties card that can later be obtained in packs or via Squad Building Challenges, once the winner has been announced.
